Title: When I Get Out
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Courtney Kemp Agboh, Safia Dirie (executive story editor), Jeff Dix (story editor), Monica Mitchell (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Having been arrested for the murder of Agent Knox, Ghost faces threats from multiple angles. The feds begin to build their case and Tasha scrambles to get bail. Tommy gets used to his new role and enlists help in recovering Tariq.
